text: When does the V-Model work well? Major challenge: Change! *_ Requirements are more or less clear * Software seems to be easily changeable *_ Requirements are more or less stable *_ Developers like to change/improve code + The system solution may be complicated * Customers usually do not understand but can easily be decomposed into what is easy and what is hard to change smaller units + Plus: In systems (mechanics, electronics, *_ The single units can be developed more software), software is often the “glue” that or less independently is developed and tested last. If requirements are unclear and volatile and/or if technology is challenging, you need iterations & and feedback to approach a solution ‘ﬁ Universität
